page.title: 02GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: THE REASON IT CLOSED DOWN WAS THAT MANY PEOPLE WERE BUYING VIDEO RECORDERS.THERE ARE FIVE OR SIX VIDEO SHOPS WHICH LET YOU HIRE VIDEO CASSETTES.THESE SHOPS SELL COMPUTER SOFTWARE AS THE MICRO COMPUTER IS BECOMING MORE AND MORE POPULAR NOWADAYS. THERE IS A THEATRE WHICH IS NEW TO RETFORD.THERE ARE MORE THINGS LIKE A POLICE STATION,HOSPITAL, FIRE STATION AND AMBULANCE STATION.IN THE VILLAGE OF ORDSALL (CONNECTED TO RETFORD)IS AN ESTATE FOR ELDERLY PEOPLE AND A COMMUNITY CENTRE.IT IS OPPOSITE OUR SCHOOL (ORDSALL JUNIOR SCHOOL)AND SOME PUPILS FROM THE SCHOOL HAVE VISITED THE CENTRE TO ENTERTAIN THE OLD PEOPLE .THE TOWN COULD DO WITH MORE FACILITIES FOR YOUNGER PEOPLE TO ENJOY.THE TOWN HAS ITS OWN GOLF COURSE AND{LOCAL NEWSPAPER,THE RETFORD TIMES.
